product_name: Salomon Trax Mid Waterproof Hiking Shoes - Kids' - 2013 Closeout
long_description: The kids' Salomon Trax Mid Waterproof Hiking Shoes offer trail-ready, waterproof performance for adventurous young ones. Mid-height suede leather uppers surround ankles for extra support and offer flexible, abrasion-resistant and long-lasting performance. Nylon mesh panels in uppers enhance breathability; synthetic toe caps protect toes. Waterproof, breathable membranes let feet breathe while protecting them from the elements and keeping them dry. Tuck quick-pull laces into the integrated lace pockets to keep them from snagging on anything. Padded heels, collars and tongues increase comfort by alleviating pressure; heel loops aid entry. Nylon linings wick moisture, dry quickly and breathe well. EVA midsoles absorb shock and offer ample cushioning all day. Salomon Trax Mid Waterproof Hiking Shoes boast nonmarking Contagrip(R) rubber outsoles to deliver reliable traction. Closeout.
short_description: The kids' Salomon Trax Mid Waterproof Hiking Shoes offer trail-ready, waterproof performance for adventurous young ones.
